Dear {{ACCOUNT_BILL_PROPERTY_ACCOUNT_NAME}}, Your BlueWave Community Solar Share statement has been posted!
This statement reflects the net metering credits your Community Solar Share generated this month.
View the attachment in this email to see your statement.
You can choose to pay your bill in one of three ways:
Manual online payment Auto-pay on your credit card or from your checking account Paper Check*
To pay your bill, login to your BlueWave Customer Portal.

Not At All Likely Extremely Likely
Thanks for joining us to make 'Solar for the 100%' not just a mission, but a reality.
